verbose_text: Of all cytokines and chemokines tested, plasma levels of CXCL1 were significantly reduced both in Ldlr -/- Siglec-G -/- mice (XREF_FIG E) and Ldlr -/- mice lacking Siglec-G in B cells only compared to their respective controls (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY E).
evidence: CXCL1 were significantly reduced both in Ldlr -/- Siglec-G -/-  mice ( XREF_FIG E) and Ldlr -/-  mice lacking Siglec-G
